resources.string:
A Clock Built For You

Ora is a modern, full-screen clock designed for elegance, functionality, and deep personalization. Turn any device into a stunning desk clock, a nightstand companion, or a focused work timer.

You have complete control to create a look that is uniquely yours. Full customization is at your fingertips, including the ability to select your own wallpaper from your device\'s gallery.

Ora is on a path of continuous development. Future updates will bring exciting new functions and features, including planned integration with Google Gemini and Google Assistant.

Engineered for Efficiency

We understand that an always-on display requires smart power management. Ora includes several key features to provide the best possible experience while being mindful of your battery.

Key Power-Saving Features

• Smart Auto-Dimming: After 3 minutes of inactivity, the screen automatically dims to significantly reduce power consumption while keeping the time visible.

• OLED Optimized: The default Amoled Black theme is perfect for OLED screens. It turns off black pixels completely, offering maximum power savings and a stunning, high-contrast look.

Tips for Best Performance

For the longest battery life, we recommend using the Amoled Black background and keeping your device\'s screen brightness at a comfortable, low level. The power-saving features work hard, but less screen light always means more battery.

Settings Guide

A complete overview of every setting in Ora.

Preset Management

• Apply a Preset: Choose from a dropdown to instantly apply one of your 5 saved styles.
• Save Current Style: Saves your current look into one of the 5 preset slots.
• Clear a Preset Slot: Permanently deletes a saved style from a preset slot.

Look & Feel

Time Display

• Time Format: Switch between 12-hour and 24-hour display.
• Clock Font/Size/Color/Shadow: Full customization for the main time digits.
• Separators: Show or hide the \':\' and change its color.
• AM/PM Indicator: Toggle visibility and customize the font, size, color, and shadow.
• Digit Background: Change the style of the box behind each number to Filled, Outline, or None. Control its color, transparency, and padding.

Date Display

• Customize the font, size, color, and shadow for the date text, or hide it completely.

Background Style

• Choose from predefined styles or select any image from your device for the main screen background.

Behavior & Features

• Automation & Fun: Discover new styles with the Randomize button or enable Auto-change Text Colors to have them cycle automatically.

System

• Auto-hide Settings Button: Control how long the settings button stays visible (3-20 seconds).

• Take Screenshot of Clock: Saves a high-quality image of your current clock screen to your device\'s photo gallery.

• Reset All Settings: Restore every setting to its original, default state.

A Note From the Developer

Thank you for using Ora! I\'ve spent many days and weeks designing, coding, and testing this app. It\'s a passion project, born from countless errors and revisions to create a bug-free and beautiful experience for you.

My plan is to continue working on Ora, adding new features and improvements. You can always check the latest developments on my GitHub page. To keep the late-night coding sessions going, I run on coffee. If you enjoy the app, treating me to a coffee is a wonderful way to show your support and is greatly appreciated!
Thank you for your generosity and support!

string-array.item: "The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention."
"We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give."
"No one has ever become poor by giving."
"Giving is not just about making a donation. It is about making a difference."
"The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others."
"To ease another’s heartache is to forget one’s own."
"Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need."
"The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away."
"You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you."
"It\'s not how much we give but how much love we put into giving."
"Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does."
"The wise man does not lay up his own treasures. The more he gives to others, the more he has for his own."
"Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love."
"There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up."
"A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal."
"Since you get more joy out of giving joy to others, you should put a good deal of thought into the happiness that you are able to give."
"Remember that the happiest people are not those getting more, but those giving more."
"For it is in giving that we receive."
"What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal."
"If you want to touch the past, touch a rock. If you want to touch the present, touch a flower. If you want to touch the future, touch a life."
"The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving."
"I have found that among its other benefits, giving liberates the soul of the giver."
"Attention is the rarest and purest form of generosity."
"Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours."
"A man\'s true wealth is the good he does in this world."
"Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others."
"Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth."
"The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving."
"When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed."
"He who serves the most, reaps the most."
